articles.description: The plan to bring contents for kids was revealed through a 30-second ad spod titled 'The Next Generation'.
articles.content: Apple has released a 30-second ad on YouTube and other channels to promote child-friendly movies and shows on its Apple TV+ streaming service as summer vacation begins in most countries including in … [+978 chars]
